resources.string:
Calls are coming to Xabber for Android! Not this release, but they are on our roadmap.

Really impatient users can test working VoIP right now in Web and iOS versions of Xabber.

If you want to keep Xabber strong and speed up Xabber development, take part in our crowdfunding campaign on Patreon!
This section is reserved for future functionality. Stay tuned for updates.
